response.job_title: Senior sales specialist Home and personal care & Performance Silicones en Dow Chemical Co.
response.summary:
Account manager in Consumer Solutions business in Dow Chemical focus on Home and personal care and Performance Silicones. Chemical engineer of National University of Colombia with three years of experience. 
I have ease and willingness to learn. I am an honest person, committed, orderly, responsible and dedicated to my work, with good attitude to teamwork and ease to interact in group, with a high degree of sensitivity to situations that touch the groups where I work. As a professional I'm analytical and proactive, aware of the sense of urgency and ability to work under pressure. On the other hand, I'm willing to meet satisfactorily the functions placed me, obligations and standards which are established by the team, while maintaining professional ethics. I have a good management of the Office package and computational tools.
When I was undergraduate, I have trained in the area of production and handling of food and biotechnology, data management, process and product design such as agro-ecological food production, food drying and introduction to food engineering.
In my work experience, I supported technical projects in microbial and energy applications. I had contact with customers and I learnt to focus on the communication skills with customers (even suppliers) and to offer best solution according to their needs. Also, I had contact with many chemical plants and industries as paints and coatings, home care and personal care products, oil and gas, food and feed products, and others that let me have a better vision of new trends in industry in Latin-American region.
response.skills: Gestión de ventas, Sales, Commercial focus, Industria química, Comunicación, Ingeniería química, Industria alimentaria, Ingeniería de procesos, Química, Procesado de los alimentos, Microbiología, Análisis de datos, Investigación y desarrollo, Chemistry, Chemical Engineering, Mejora de procesos de negocio, Biodiversidad, Food Industry, Microbiology, Gestión de proyectos

profile_positions.description: Senior sales specialist focus on Andean countries and South region
profile_positions.title: Senior sales specialist Consumer Solutions

company.name: Dow
company.description:
Our ambition is to become the most innovative, customer centric, inclusive and sustainable materials science company in the world. 

We combine global breadth; asset integration and scale; focused innovation and materials science expertise; leading business positions; and environmental, social and governance leadership to achieve profitable growth and help deliver a sustainable future.

Dow's portfolio of plastics, industrial intermediates, coatings and silicones businesses delivers a broad range of differentiated, science-based products and solutions for its customers in high-growth market segments, such as packaging, infrastructure, mobility and consumer applications.

We operate manufacturing sites in 31 countries and employ approximately 37,800 people. Dow delivered sales of approximately $57 billion in 2022.
